DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Determine 6-month survival patient metastatic adenocarcinoma pancreas treat bevacizumab , gemcitabine , oxaliplatin . Secondary - Determine objective response rate patient measurable disease treat regimen . - Determine median survival , progression-free survival , time treatment failure , overall survival patient treat regimen . - Determine toxicity regimen patient . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive gemcitabine IV 100 minute bevacizumab IV 30-90 minute day 1 15 . Patients also receive oxaliplatin IV 120 minute day 2 16 . Courses repeat every 28 day absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients achieve complete response ( CR ) receive 2 course therapy beyond CR . After completion study treatment , patient follow every 3-6 month 5 year .
